webDevelopment.title: Web Application Development
webDevelopment.description: We provide high-quality web application development using the latest technologies, building scalable and maintainable systems.

consulting.title: IT Consulting
consulting.description: We propose optimal IT strategies and web service architectures to solve your business challenges, improve operational efficiency, and support digital transformation. Our expertise covers system optimization, workflow automation, and performance enhancement.

education.title: IT Education
education.description: We provide comprehensive IT education programs including web development training, Large Language Model (LLM) integration, prompt engineering, and AI technology applications. From hands-on coding workshops to advanced AI implementation, we support team-wide skill development.

digitalContent.title: Digital Content Development
digitalContent.description: From website and app UI design to content creation, we create engaging digital experiences.

outsourcing.title: Contract Development
outsourcing.description: We provide high-quality systems with flexible development structure tailored to your needs, supporting consistently from project management to maintenance.

llmServices.title: LLM & AI Solutions
llmServices.description: We deliver cutting-edge AI solutions powered by Large Language Models to automate business processes, enhance customer service with intelligent chatbots, and provide data-driven insights. Our services include custom AI model development, prompt optimization, and seamless integration with existing systems.
